product_name: Columbia Outdoor Enthusiast II T-Shirt - Women's
long_description: With its festive circular pattern, the Columbia Outdoor Enthusiast II T-Shirt for women is perfect to wear to an outdoor festival. Polyester helps it dry quickly; cotton lets you breathe. Polyester/cotton/rayon blend keeps you comfy under a wide range of weather conditions. A close fit and cap sleeves let you move freely, whether you're dancing or doing cartwheels.
short_description: With its festive circular pattern, the Columbia Outdoor Enthusiast II T-Shirt for women is perfect to wear to an outdoor festival. Polyester helps it dry quickly; cotton lets you breathe.
